title: Cajun chicken with white rice
ingredients: ['oil, as needed for cooking', '2 skinless chicken breast fillets, sliced into strips', 'Cajun spice, to taste', '1 to 2 pinches pepper', '1 teaspoon chicken gravy granules', '4 tablespoons boiling water', '85ml full fat cream', '2 handfuls peas (optional)', '2 handfuls mushrooms, sliced (optional)', "1 packet Uncle Ben'sÂ® white rice"]
